participant_2.background:
I have been wanting to try my luck at horse racing.
i graduated with a nursing degree.
I was raised in the mountains, where I learned to ski at a young age.
I want to decorate my home with vintage furniture.
my favorite pizza is pepperoni.

content.text: I was raised in the mountains, too! I learned to ski when I was a kid.
Oh, really? Where did you grow up?
I grew up in the Sierra Nevada Mountains, in California.
That sounds beautiful! I grew up in the Rockies, in Colorado.
I've been to Colorado a few times, it's beautiful there too!
It is! I miss it a lot.
Me too. I've always wanted to try my luck at horse racing.
That would be fun! I've never been to a horse race, but I've always wanted to go.
I've been to a few, and they're really fun. I won a few bucks on my first race, too.
That's awesome! I'm not much of a gambler, but I'd love to try my luck at horse racing sometime.
If you ever make it out to California, I'll take you to a horse race.
That would be great! I'll definitely let you know if I make it out there.
